item.title: 韩国总统李明博在地区紧张局势加剧之际抵达中国
item.description: 韩国总统李在明抵达北京，开始他上任以来的首次中国之行，在地区紧张局势不断加剧之际，首尔希望稳定与这个重要经济伙伴的关系。【原文：South Korea’s President Lee Jae Myung has arrived in Beijing for his first China trip since taking office, as Seoul looks to steady ties with a key economic partner at a time of rising regional tensions.】

item.title: 马来西亚、法国、印度抨击 X 公司的 "冒犯性 "Grok 图片
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能聊天机器人 "Grok "在社交媒体平台 "X "上根据用户提示创建了包括未成年人在内的性化图像后，正面临着全球各地越来越多的批评和政府行动的威胁。【原文：Elon Musk’s Grok is facing mounting criticism and threats of government action around the world after the artificial intelligence chatbot created sexualized images, including of minors, on the social media platform X in response to user prompts.】

item.title: 暴风雨袭击加州，洛杉矶面临洪水警报
item.description: 周六晚间，随着两场强风暴向洛杉矶袭来，洛杉矶正在为可能发生的洪水做准备。【原文：Los Angeles was bracing for possible flooding Saturday evening as two powerful storms headed toward the city.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉副总统罗德里格斯被授予临时总统权力
item.description: 委内瑞拉最高法院命令副总统德尔西-罗德里格斯立即以代理身份承担并行使所有总统权力。【原文：Venezuela’s Supreme Court orders Vice President Delcy Rodriguez to immediately assume and exercise all presidential powers in an acting capacity.】

item.title: 科罗纳多的 Curragh 矿业公司暂停运营加剧了其财务困境
item.description: 澳大利亚昆士兰州科罗纳多全球资源公司（Coronado Global Resources Inc.【原文：Coal mining across Coronado Global Resources Inc.’s Curragh complex in Australia’s Queensland state was halted after a worker was killed, adding to woes for the company that’s already dealing with slumping prices.】

item.title: 朝鲜在李熙峰会前一天发射弹道导弹
item.description: 据韩联社和日本海上保安厅报道，在韩国和中国领导人在北京举行峰会的前一天，朝鲜向其东部沿海水域发射了两枚不明弹道导弹。【原文：North Korea fired two unidentified ballistic missiles toward waters off its eastern coast, according to Yonhap News Agency and the Japan Coast Guard, a day before leaders from South Korea and China hold a summit in Beijing.】

item.title: 对人工智能泡沫的担忧和政策分化笼罩着 2026 年的亚洲股市
item.description: 亚洲股市以大幅上涨拉开了新年的序幕，但由于对人工智能泡沫的担忧以及整个地区利率走势的分化，亚洲股市的上涨可能面临阻力。【原文：Asian equities kicked off the new year with sharp gains, but the advance may face headwinds from worries over an artificial-intelligence bubble and diverging interest-rate paths across the region.】

item.title: 美国招聘人数温和，为就业市场低迷的一年画上句号
item.description: 美国 12 月份的就业增长可能依然温和，结束了自 2009 年以来就业增长最疲软的一年。【原文：US job gains probably remained modest in December, wrapping up one of the weakest years for employment growth since 2009.】

item.title: 人工智能债务狂潮引发信贷交易狂潮信贷周刊
item.description: 人工智能支出和私人信贷市场的增长不仅刺激企业借贷更多资金，还帮助创造了公司债券交易的新纪录。【原文：Artificial intelligence spending and the growth of the private credit market aren’t just spurring companies to borrow more, they’re also helping to generate fresh records for corporate-bond trading.】

item.title: 美联储保尔森称今年晚些时候可能进一步降息
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长安娜-保尔森表示，2026 年晚些时候可能会适度增加降息幅度，但这要以经济前景良好为条件。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Anna Paulson said modest additional interest-rate cuts could be appropriate later in 2026, but conditioned that outcome on a benign outlook for the economy.】

item.title: Exor 与法拉利家族延长管理汽车制造商的股东协议
item.description: Exor NV 和法拉利家族成员已同意延长法拉利公司的股东协议，因为这家意大利豪华汽车制造商正在更广泛的行业逆风中开发其首款全电动车型。【原文：Exor NV and members of the Ferrari family have agreed to extend their shareholders’ agreement for Ferrari NV, as the Italian luxury car-maker develops its first fully-electric model amid broader sector headwinds.】

item.title: 在全球供应充裕的情况下，石油市场或将承受马杜罗的冲击
item.description: 尽管委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗在美国空袭后被俘标志着地缘政治的震撼性发展，但早期报告显示，全球石油市场将在很大程度上顺势而为。【原文：While the capture of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro following US airstrikes marks a seismic geopolitical development, early reports suggest that the global oil market will largely take the move in its stride.】

item.title: 柏林停电，5 万户家庭疑遭纵火袭击
item.description: 周六下午，柏林西南部在凌晨发生了一起疑似纵火袭击事件，警方称约有 50,000 户家庭和 2,000 家企业停电。【原文：Some 50,000 households and 2,000 businesses in southwest Berlin were without power on Saturday afternoon after a suspected arson attack in the early hours of the morning, police said.】

item.title: 小米电动车大获成功，雄心勃勃要在 2026 年实现交付目标
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）希望在其电动汽车业务取得突破性进展的基础上再接再厉，将 2026 年的交付目标提高到 55 万辆，以提高其在竞争激烈的中国市场的份额，并进军海外市场。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. is looking to build on a breakout year for its electric vehicle business, raising its delivery target to 550,000 units in 2026 as it seeks to boost its share of China’s fiercely competitive market and make inroads overseas.】

item.title: 中国产能何去何从是 2026 年的问题
item.description: 国家的过剩产出将对世界其他地区产生重大影响。【原文：The nation’s excess output will have major consequences for the rest of the world.】

item.title: 伦敦地产经纪公司 Dexters 的所有者正在探索潜在的出售机会：天空
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）周六援引未具名消息来源报道，私募股权公司奥克利资本（Oakley Capital）正在探索出售伦敦最大连锁房产中介公司的可能性，其估值可能超过 5 亿英镑（约合 6.73 亿美元）。【原文：Private equity firm Oakley Capital is exploring a potential sale of London’s biggest estate agency chain that could value it at more than £500 million ($673 million), Sky News reported on Saturday, citing sources it didn’t name.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与债券持有人就 10 亿美元违约债券达成原则性协议
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚表示，它与债券持有人就2023年违约的10亿美元债券的重组达成了原则性协议，并认为今年的债务重组工作取得了进展。【原文：Ethiopia says it reached an agreement in principle with bondholders over the restructure of a $1 billion bond on which it defaulted in 2023, and sees progress in efforts to revamp the debt this year.】

item.title: 加拉加斯居民报告有巨大爆炸声和飞机飞过
item.description: 委内瑞拉首都加拉加斯的居民报告说，城市上空传来巨大的爆炸声和飞机的飞行声，多个地区停电。【原文：Residents in the Venezuelan capital of Caracas reported loud explosions and aircraft overflying the city, with multiple areas experiencing power outages.】

item.title: 重建希望渺茫，金门资本保险公司 PHL 走向清算
item.description: 在发现这家十年前被私募股权公司 Golden Gate Capital 收购的陷入困境的人寿保险公司的状况比之前想象的更糟之后，州监管机构放弃了恢复 PHL Variable Insurance Co.【原文：State regulators are abandoning a plan to rehabilitate PHL Variable Insurance Co. and may pursue liquidation instead, after finding that the struggling life insurer — acquired by private equity firm Golden Gate Capital a decade ago — is in worse shape than previously thought.】

item.title: 阿根廷出售美元抑制比索下跌，新规则开始实施
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，阿根廷财政部周五抛售美元，希望在允许较大波动的新规则生效的第一天限制比索的跌幅。【原文：Argentina’s Treasury sold dollars Friday, people familiar with the matter said, looking to limit the decline of the peso on the first day that new rules allowing for larger swings kicked in.】

item.title: 华尔街在经历 2009 年以来最佳表现后承载着巨大期望
item.description: 新一年的开端与上一年的结束如出一辙，市场上涨，华尔街信心不减，几乎没有迹象表明推动 2025 年发展的力量已经走到尽头。不那么明朗的是，跨资产同步还能持续多久。【原文：The new year opened much as the last one ended, with markets rising, Wall Street confidence intact and little sign the forces that powered 2025 have run their course. What’s less clear is how long the cross-asset synchrony can last.】

item.title: 更多驶往委内瑞拉的油轮在美国封锁下转向
item.description: 由于美国威胁要扣押运输石油的船只，以资助尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统的政权，越来越多的油轮正远离委内瑞拉。【原文：More oil tankers are turning away from Venezuela as the US threatens to seize vessels transporting oil that helps fund the regime of President Nicolas Maduro.】

item.title: AQR 的多策略 Apex 在动荡的量化年中增长 19.6
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司的多策略产品在 2025 年的回报率达到 19.6%，即使在量化投资动荡的一年里，也延续了其东山再起的势头。【原文：AQR Capital Management’s multistrategy offering returned 19.6% in 2025, extending its comeback even in a turbulent year for quantitative investing.】

item.title: 准备好再次谈论 DeepSeek
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 英国创下热量和日照新纪录，推动太阳能发电发展
item.description: 英国刚刚度过了有记录以来最温暖、阳光最充足的一年。【原文：The UK just wrapped the warmest and sunniest year ever recorded.】

item.title: 工资上涨震荡市场，哥伦比亚酝酿价格管制
item.description: 哥伦比亚政府正在考虑在大幅提高最低工资后实行价格管制，以遏制令投资者感到不安的通胀压力。【原文：Colombia’s government is considering price controls following a sharp increase in the minimum wage as it seeks to curb inflationary pressures that have rattled investors.】

item.title: 加密货币窃贼转移到线下，在国内恐吓投资者
item.description:
价格上涨和加密货币交易的不可逆转性导致野蛮入室抢劫和绑架事件激增。【原文：

Rising prices and the irreversible nature of crypto transactions have led to a surge of brutal home invasions and kidnappings.

】

item.title: 赞比亚去美元化努力为克瓦查反弹注入新动力
item.description: 赞比亚的克瓦查汇率接近两年多来的最高点，因为政府下令限制在国内交易中使用外币，促使交易商抛售绿卡。【原文：Zambia’s kwacha traded near the highest in more than two years, as a government order to curb the use of foreign currencies in domestic transactions prompted traders to sell the greenback.】

item.title: 押注基督的回归，波利市场年收益 5.5%
item.description: 唉，耶稣基督并没有在 2025 年重返地球。对大多数人来说，这可能并不特别令人惊讶或值得注意。但对某些赌徒来说，这却是个好消息。【原文：Alas, Jesus Christ did not return to Earth in 2025. This might not come as particularly surprising or noteworthy to most people. But for a certain crowd of bettors, it was terrific news.】

item.title: 美国股市攀升至 2026 年伊始，重燃圣诞反弹希望
item.description: 由于投资者在下周举行的大规模 CES 大会前买入科技股，并对唐纳德-特朗普总统放宽关税政策的迹象感到高兴，周五 S&P 500 指数在开盘时攀升。【原文：The S&P 500 Index climbed at the open on Friday as investors bought tech stocks ahead of next week’s massive CES conference and cheered signs President Donald Trump was easing up on tariff policies.】
